Title: The Emperor
Description:
We have everything we need. It's time to start brewing.

Pay attention, $n... you might learn a thing or two.
ObjectivesText: Stand by and help Chen Stormstout with his brew.
CompletionText: It takes more than three seconds to make beer, $n. Even when your name is Chen Stormstout.
RewardText: Thanks for waiting so long. You are as patient as you are brave.
